oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Andrew Johnson in Masonic Knights Templar uniform
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: President Andrew Johnson wore a Masonic Knights Templar uniform, including a sword. Johnson joined the Nashville Commandery of the Knights Templar in 1859 and received Scottish Rite degrees in the White House in 1867.; The reverse side bears the stamp of C. C. Giers, Artist, from Nashville, Tenn.
